Package edu.ou.cs2334.project4.models

Class NonogramMakerModel

java.lang.Object
edu.ou.cs2334.project4.models.NonogramMakerModel
public class NonogramMakerModel extends Object
The NonogramMakerModel class that holds the functionality of the puzzle maker. Contains the state of each cell and methods that calculate the nonogram numbers and saves them to the text files.
Version:
0.1
Author:
Henry Malilay

    NonogramMakerModel​(int numRows, int numCols)
    Instantiates a new nonogram maker model with the specified number of rows and columns.
    NonogramMakerModel​(File file)
    Instantiates a new nonogram maker model by reading data from file to populate the grid and to set the rows and columns of the grid.
    NonogramMakerModel​(String filename)
    Instantiates a new nonogram maker model by passing in the name of the file.

    • NonogramMakerModel

      public NonogramMakerModel​(int numRows, int numCols) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Instantiates a new nonogram maker model with the specified number of rows and columns.
      Parameters:
      numRows - the number of rows for the grid
      numCols - the number of columns for the grid
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - throws exception if the argument is invalid less than 0

    • NonogramMakerModel

      public NonogramMakerModel​(File file) throws FileNotFoundException
      Instantiates a new nonogram maker model by reading data from file to populate the grid and to set the rows and columns of the grid.
      Parameters:
      file - the file containing the data
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - throws exception if the file is not found
